thread.title: Photographer Eric Lafforgue shares portraits for International Women's Day
thread.title_full: Photographer Eric Lafforgue shares portraits for International Women's Day

title: Photographer Eric Lafforgue shares portraits for International Women's Day
text:
Previous slide Next slide 1 of 18 View All Skip Ad 
In celebration of women of the world and International Women's Day, photographer Eric Lafforgue shares a gallery of exceptional portraits of fascinating individuals he has met on his travels. The Frenchman started taking photographs in 2006, and since then has spent most of his time travelling the globe documenting populations in dangerous and less visited regions. 
A policewoman stands to attention, Hargeisa, Somaliland. Eric Lafforgue/Cover Images
